description: User login with user name and its password.User get logged in by using username and password including device_id.content-type must be application/json in header request.

title: Complaint Log
name: PostComplaint
description: Log your complain regarding purchased product. content-type must be application/json in header.

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "status": true,
    "message": "Your complain has been logged successfully.",
    "data": {
        "product_id": "72",
        "type": "product related",
        "description": "one two",
        "created_at": "2018-03-02 07:58:29",
        "consumer_id": "9",
        "complain_code": "085374",
        "status": "pending"
    }
}

Error 4xx.description: api error as per request like record not found or validation errors.

Parameter.description: Ivoice image and must in format any one (png|gpeg|gpg|pdf) (Required).

title: Register User
name: PostUser
description: Create a new account. Register new user with below following parameters.content-type must be application/json in header request.

Parameter.description: Date of birth must in in format YYYY-DD-MM (Required).
Gender of user like any one (male, femal) (Required).
Mobile no of user and accept only 10 digits only and must be unique(Required).

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
 {
    "status": true,
    "message": "Your account has been created.",
    "data": {
        "user_name": "dev test",
        "email": "dev.test@gmail.com",
        "mobile_no": "9343233781",
        "gender": "male",
        "dob": "2000-2-2",
        "terms_conditions": "1"
        "created_at": "2018-02-11 17:47:39",
        "modified_at": "2018-02-11 17:47:39"
    }
}
